headline: Pressure Cooker Red Beans and Sausage
name: Pressure Cooker Red Beans and Sausage
description: Tender red beans, sliced hickory-smoked pork sausage, onion, celery, and bell pepper are spiced with Cajun seasoning in this comforting meal. Best served over hot cooked rice.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, or to taste
5 cups cold water, or as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine red beans, sausage, bay leaf, Cajun seasoning, garlic, onion, celery, green pepper, salt parsley, and cumin in pressure cooker. Pour in water to cover, according to manufacturer's directions (do not go over line inside of pot). Stir to combine.
Seal lid and bring pot to full pressure over high heat. Reduce heat to low, maintaining full pressure, and cook for 30 minutes. Allow pressure to drop naturally. Remove lid, stir, and serve.
